sub_title: Retail Software Tester - Feedback Engineer - POS Tester - Kassavervanging - SAP Tester - Scrum Master - Agile Tester - Logistiek - Supermarkten
summary:
📱 06 - 28 45 25 51 | 📧 berry@vanderrijk.nl | 🌐 www.retailtester.nl | Currently not available for new opportunities. Only at retailers.

Berry van der Rijk is a Retail Software Tester with lots of experience in software testing and is specialized in testing of Retail software systems, such as Point of Sales, Mobile Cashiers, SAP (Retail, MM, SD, FiCo, BW, POS DM, PI), OMS, Backoffices, etc.

He is certified in all kinds of test methods such as TMap Test Engineer and TMap TestManager, TestFrame Foundation, ISTQB Foundation and ISTQB Advanced Test Manager and is a Certified Agile Tester, Certified Agile Business Analist, Scrum Master and Itilv3 and Prince2 certified.

Berry has worked for more than 19 years as a test consultant for, among others, Sogeti, Accenture, Logica and CGI. Since 2018, Berry has started as an independent retail test consultant.

📱 06 - 28 45 25 51 | 📧 berry@vanderrijk.nl | 🌐 www.retailtester.nl

treasury_media.title: Retail Software Tester
treasury_media.description: Kassasystemen zijn er in vele soorten en maten, maar er is één ding wat ze allemaal gemeen hebben: ze worden allemaal ontwikkeld door een softwareleverancier en ze worden allemaal gebruikt door retailers . De reden dat retailers dit niet zelf gaan...

education.field_of_study: Dutch,English, Economy, Math A, Math B, Science, Social studies

projects.title: Kassa Vervanging retail & Services
projects.description: Het project Kassa Vervanging Retail & Services richt zich erop om alle kassa’s te vervangen van alle Retail en Services formules van NS Stations. Het nieuwe kassasysteem is het product AXI RS van Retail specialist AXI. Voor Retail gaat het om de vervanging van de huidige Oscar kassa’s (MICROS) voor onder andere de Kiosk, StationsHuiskamer, Broodzaak, Julia’s, Smullers, Starbucks en om de introductie van een mobiele kassa voor de RailCatering. Voor Services gaat het om de vervanging van de WILMAR kassa’s bij alle Fiets & Service winkels die in of bij ongeveer 20 fietsenstalling staan verspreid over Nederland. Het project is gefaseerd opgeleverd door AXI BV en naast de nieuwe kassa is ook een nieuw back-office systeem onderdeel van het project samen met de interfaces die voor NS Stations zijn gemaakt om te kunnen communiceren met SAP BW (POS DM) en SAP ECC. De ingebruikname van het nieuwe kassasysteem betekend ook het in gebruik nemen van SAP Retail als bron van de artikel -en vestigingsstam, het verwerken van de logistieke bewegingen en de financiële afhandeling naar SAP FiCo.

projects.description: CGI offers, together with our partner Powertopay, a complete Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solution. With this solution clients can convert payment and direct debit files to SEPA XML format and convert reports back to their local reporting formats.

projects.title: Staalbankiers
projects.description:
The objective of the transformation project is to provide Staalbankiers with a new banking application infrastructure that is essential for its daily operations and activities as conducted by Logica BPO for Staalbankiers. 
On November 21, 2011 I have been appointed as Project Manager for the AO/IC team to deliver the process descriptions (aimed to describe the business processes of Staalbankiers and Logica BPO as they will be in place after the implementation of Thaler (the To-Be processes), also referred to as Administrative Organisation and Internal Control (AO/IC)), as soon as possible with the highest quality.

projects.title: ING-OIB-Payments
projects.description:
Within "OIB Payments, Solution Delivery, Billing Cards & Cash, Test" I am currently in charge of several projects as a Test Manager.

OS Upgrade:
Within this project the system software of the HPNonStop will be upgraded to the latest stack within ING: 2011.1 (H06.21).

OSA ITM:
Testing the still open defects and 2 new changes to the screens and reports of the "Unmanned Deposit Systems (Onbemande Stort Automaten)".

SEPA-ARI:
Testing a small change on the interface between the "Verantwoordingsschil" and MING and testing a defect that has been inherited from a different project.

“Chip-to-magstripe” skimming fraude detection:
Testing the changes that are neccesary for changing the authorisation checks so skimming can be detected easier and earlier.

projects.title: Nationale-Nederlanden (Banksparen)
projects.description:
Nationale-Nederlanden is with more than 5 million residential and business customers one of the largest and most prominent companies in the Netherlands. The combination of 6000 skilled and dedicated employees, good products and an appropriate relationship between price and quality allows us to find the best solution for our customers. 
The project "Banksparen" (Bank savings) aims to introduce bank savings for "NN Particulieren", to enter the market fast with the first products (supplementary pension schemes and severance pay) and to establish an environment which will make a growth to a richer product mix possible. The testassignment for the project "Banksparen" consists of a structured design, prepare, implement and secure (the future) of tests for bank savings. For the project "Banksparen" I started as a test coordinator from since April 2011 until May 2011 I have been responsible for the whole testing process as a Test Manager.

company.name: Van der Rijk - Retail Software Testing

profile_positions.description: With more than 15 years of experience as a software tester and test manager, combined with my extensive knowledge of logistics retail processes and POS systems, I can test your (cash register) system in a short period of time based on a product risk analysis and give a release advice on the basis of which you can determine whether or not you want to use the delivered release in use at your sites.
profile_positions.title: Retail Software Tester

profile_positions.description: At Kwantum I have started automating the regression test set for the Cow Hills POS, just as I have done for Leen Bakker.
profile_positions.title: Retail Software Tester

profile_positions.description:
As a Retail Software Tester I was part of the Cow Hills implementation project team in which we replaced the old cash register system (RetailJ) with the Retail Online Suite of Cow Hills Retail.

Since oktober 2020 we have started with testautomating the testscripts for the POS using KeyLib as a tool. With this tool I have automated almost all testscripts that are part of the regression test set for Leen Bakker.

In June 2020 the last store migrated to Cow Hills and I am still involved in testing the new releases, analyzing production issues and drawing up new wishes for the cash register and the chain, together with the key users.
profile_positions.title: Retail Software Tester

profile_positions.description:
I was asked by Intergamma to support them in preparing and executing all test types for the full upgrade of the POS system from AXI (Daytona to Fiji) at Intergamma B.V. for the Gamma, Karwei and Gamma Belgium chains.

I have optimized the already existing regression test set and have used this set to test all the releases that have been delivered by AXI. 

In july 2022 we have started a pilot for the software and in december 2022 we have started a pilot for the database upgrade. In january 2023 the full deployment to all stores have been finished without any disruptions to the stores.
profile_positions.title: Retail Software Tester
Testcoach Retalix R10 project

profile_positions.description: I have been asked by Vomar Voordeelmarkt to improve the regression test strategy and optimize the regression test scripts, so that they can be used with every release of the cash register system, so that the risk of production issues can be reduced.
profile_positions.title: Retail Test Consultant

profile_positions.description:
COOP Supermarkten is working on a major project for the implementation of a new POS application. This project has a major impact, both on the organization and on the applications.

In addition to setting up a new test environment, the test approach of the current test team will also change. Previously their activities were limited to the POS application. In the new situation, this will become wider and must be tested more integrally. It is necessary to provide guidance to the test team with this change.

COOP Supermarkten has asked me to provide this guidance while at the same time taking on a QA role to professionalize the test process and to organize it more efficiently.

I have created a chain regression test strategy for COOP that is now used with every new release to test in a controlled manner, taking into account the chain and the different versions between the central application and the cash registers in the stores.
profile_positions.title: Retail Test Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Detailresult ICT supports the Group in the field of information provision and automation. The store systems team manages around 1700 POS systems and the adjacent systems / devices in the Dirk and Dekamarkt stores. Full (regression) testing of new updates is currently too labor intensive to be able to execute after every update.

In May 2019 I made a regression test set for the entire checkout process in the SelfCheckOut environment (directly on SCO and via self-scan with hand-held terminals) plus maintenance at the cash registers and cash machines.

Subsequently, I was also allowed to make a regression test set for the other cash register types of Detailresult and I made a dashboard for the manager of the functional management team to better understand the status of each regression test.
profile_positions.title: Regression Test Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a retail software tester I was part of the development team which is modernizing the current ERP system of PLUS Retail.

At AXI I have improved the testing and set up a process that will ensure that the delivered software meets the quality requirements of the customer.
profile_positions.title: Retail Software Tester

volunteer_experiences.description: I have created and funded the website of http://www.stichting-youri.nl/. Youri is the youngest son of my sister who is multiple complex disabled and my sister founded this foundation to improve the living conditions of multiple complex disabled people (children and adults) by collecting funds to buy specialized materials for the institutions in which these people live in.
As Treasurer for my Alumni union I was responsible for all financial issues in our organization.
